35 
38 class Bone {
39 public:
40  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
43  Bone();
44  Bone(int index);
46 
47  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
50 
51  Bone& operator=(const Bone& other);
52 
54 
55  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
58  friend class Mesh;
59 
61  int m_index = -1;
62 
65  // Local space (or bone space) is in relation to parent joint
66  // Model space is in relation to model's origin
67  // The bind (pose) transform is the position and orientation of the joint in model space, i.e.,
68  // the bind pose is the T-pose of the skeleton, and the bind pose matrix of a joint describes the joint
69  // transform in T-pose
70  // The inverse bind pose transform is the inverse of this, so it brings the bone position and
71  // orientation to the origin
72  Matrix4x4g m_invBindPose;
73 
75 };
76

110  bool hasChild(const uint32_t& child) const {
111  for (const uint32_t& c : m_children) {
112  if (c == child) {
113  return true;
114  }
115  }
116 
117  return false;
118  }
